title: Enacts the New York state national guard and reserves child support modification act of 2011
summary: Enacts the New York state national guard and reserves child support modification act of 2011; provides for modification of child support payments in certain instances where the person called to active duty will experience a reduction in income due to loss of wages from a civilian job.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to enacting the "New York state national guard and reserves child support modification act of 2011"
